title: 日本淺草觀音寺一百籤第十六籤
poem: 破改重成望,前途喜亦寧,貴人相助處,祿馬照前程

analysis.zh: 這首詩的主題是關於在變化中尋找新的希望與前進的方向。破改重成望，表示摒棄舊有的期盼，創造新的願望；前途喜亦寧，說明未來將帶來喜悅與安寧；貴人相助處，則指出在關鍵時刻會得到高層或善心人士的援助；祿馬照前程，借用馬作吉祥象徵，暗示事業或財運將被光明照亮，順遂前進。
analysis.en: This poem’s theme is about finding new hopes and direction amidst change. '破改重成望' signals abandoning old aspirations and crafting fresh desires; '前途喜亦寧' conveys that the future will bring joy and peace; '貴人相助處' indicates that at critical moments one will receive assistance from influential or benevolent figures; '祿馬照前程' uses the image of a favorable horse to suggest that career or wealth will be illuminated and progress smoothly.
analysis.jp: この詩のテーマは、変化の中で新たな希望と進むべき方向を見出すことです。『破改重成望』は古い願望を捨て、新しい欲求を築くことを示し、'前途喜亦寧'は未来が喜びと安寧をもたらすと述べています。'貴人相助處'は重要な瞬間に影響力ある優しい人々の援助を得られることを示し、'祿馬照前程'は馬という吉祥の象徴を用いて、事業や財運が光に照らされ順調に進むことを暗示しています。

rag_analysis:
According to the poem, the core meaning is a hopeful outlook on change and the assurance of support and prosperity.
• The line '破改重成望' highlights the theme of breaking away from old expectations to form new hopes.
• '前途喜亦寧' suggests that the future will bring both joy and tranquility.
• '貴人相助處' indicates that at crucial moments, assistance will come from influential or benevolent figures.
• '祿馬照前程' uses the image of a favorable horse to symbolize that career or financial paths will be guided toward success and brightness.
• Overall, the poem reflects a philosophy that transformation leads to renewal, stability, and a bright trajectory.
